ne12:0.3_0: I shall apply myself to the analysis of meaning,
ne12:1.10_0: Right speech is right action, right livelihood, right effort, right mindfulness, right immersion, right knowledge and vision of freedom.
ne12:1.11_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong freedom are worn away.
ne12:1.12_0: And the many skillful qualities fully developed because of right freedom are good results.

ne12:1.7_0: And the many bad, unskillful qualities that arise because of wrong thought are worn away.
ne12:1.8_0: And because of right thought, many skillful qualities arise because of right thought.
